entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
